generalSetting.label: Playername (Single Player)
generalSetting.tooltip: How you want to be addressed in Single Player matches.

generalSetting.label: Playername (Multiplayer)
generalSetting.tooltip: How you want to be addressed in Multiplayer matches (except lobby).

generalSetting.label: Background Pause
generalSetting.tooltip: Pause single player games when window loses focus

generalSetting.label: Enable Welcome Screen
generalSetting.tooltip: When disabled, the welcome screen will nevertheless be shown once when a new version is available and you can always launch it from the main menu.

generalSetting.label: Enable Game Setting Tips
generalSetting.tooltip: Show tips when setting up a game.

generalSetting.label: Detailed Tooltips
generalSetting.tooltip: Show detailed tooltips for trainable units in unit-producing buildings.

generalSetting.label: Network Warnings
generalSetting.tooltip: Show which player has a bad connection in multiplayer games.

generalSetting.label: FPS Overlay
generalSetting.tooltip: Show frames per second in top right corner.

generalSetting.label: Realtime Overlay
generalSetting.tooltip: Show current system time in top right corner.

generalSetting.label: Gametime Overlay
generalSetting.tooltip: Show current simulation time in top right corner.

generalSetting.label: Ceasefire Time Overlay
generalSetting.tooltip: Always show the remaining ceasefire time.

generalSetting.label: Persist Match Settings
generalSetting.tooltip: Save and restore match settings for quick reuse when hosting another game

generalSetting.label: Late Observer Joins
generalSetting.tooltip: Allow observers to join the game after it started

generalSetting.label: Observer Limit
generalSetting.tooltip: Prevent further observers from joining if the limit is reached

generalSetting.label: Batch Training Size
generalSetting.tooltip: Number of units trained per batch

generalSetting.label: Chat Timestamp
generalSetting.tooltip: Show time that messages are posted in the lobby, gamesetup and ingame chat.

graphicsSetting.label: Post Processing
graphicsSetting.tooltip: Use screen-space postprocessing filters (HDR, Bloom, DOF, etc)

graphicsSetting.label: Unit Silhouettes
graphicsSetting.tooltip: Show outlines of units behind buildings

graphicsSetting.label: Activate water effects
graphicsSetting.tooltip: When OFF, use the lowest settings possible to render water. This makes other settings irrelevant.

graphicsSetting.label: HQ Water Effects
graphicsSetting.tooltip: Use higher-quality effects for water, rendering coastal waves, shore foam, and ships trails.

graphicsSetting.label: Real Water Depth
graphicsSetting.tooltip: Use actual water depth in rendering calculations

graphicsSetting.label: Water Reflections
graphicsSetting.tooltip: Allow water to reflect a mirror image

graphicsSetting.label: Water Refraction
graphicsSetting.tooltip: Use a real water refraction map and not transparency

graphicsSetting.label: VSync
graphicsSetting.tooltip: Run vertical sync to fix screen tearing. REQUIRES GAME RESTART

graphicsSetting.label: Limit FPS in Menus
graphicsSetting.tooltip: Limit FPS to 50 in all menus, to save power.

soundSetting.label: Action Gain
soundSetting.tooltip: In game unit action sound gain

soundSetting.label: Nick Notification
soundSetting.tooltip: Receive audio notification when someone types your nick

lobbySetting.label: Chat Backlog
lobbySetting.tooltip: Number of backlogged messages to load when joining the lobby

notificationSetting.label: Attack
notificationSetting.tooltip: Show a chat notification if you are attacked by another player

notificationSetting.label: Tribute
notificationSetting.tooltip: Show a chat notification if an ally tributes resources to another team member if teams are locked, and all tributes in observer mode

notificationSetting.label: Barter
notificationSetting.tooltip: Show a chat notification to observers when a player bartered resources

notificationSetting.label: Phase
notificationSetting.tooltip: Show a chat notification if you or an ally have started, aborted or completed a new phase, and phases of all players in observer mode
